mapper.select: SELECT email , nickname , profile_pic AS pic FROM `user` WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT user_id AS userId FROM user WHERE email = #{email}

SELECT u.user_no AS userNo , u.nickname AS nickname , u.profile_pic AS pic , s.schedule_no AS existSchedule FROM USER u JOIN user_project up ON u.user_no = up.user_no AND nickname = #{nickname} LEFT JOIN schedule s ON up.user_project_no = s.user_project_no GROUP BY userNo
SELECT user_no AS userNo, password, first_login AS firstLogin FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_no AS userNo, email, nickname, status_message AS statusMessage, profile_pic AS pic FROM user WHERE user_no = #{targetUserNo}

SELECT u.user_no AS userNo , u.nickname AS userNickname , u.profile_pic AS userPic , IF(s.schedule_no IS NULL, 0, 1) AS isExistSchedule FROM `user` u JOIN user_project up ON up.user_no = u.user_no AND up.project_no = #{projectNo} LEFT JOIN schedule s ON s.user_project_no = up.user_project_no GROUP BY u.user_no
SELECT user_no FROM schedule A INNER JOIN user_project B ON B.user_project_no=A.user_project_no WHERE schedule_no=#{scheduleNo}
